title: Honey Bunny Boy ⟨Official⟩
description:
Description :
        A cute romantic comedy about a hot but mysterious new student and a tough-looking guy who is actually a cute bunny on the inside?In a world where demihumans?humans born with animal traits?live amongst normal people, Arashi Usami, the biggest delinquent in school, has a huge secret.Despite being big and brawny with looks that could kill, he's actually a rabbit type demihuman.In order to keep his identity concealed, Arashi acts like a lone wolf at school.Then, one day comes the cool and cheerful but mysterious hottie, Shizuka Yamada.For some reason, not only does he seem unafraid of Arashi, he even seems to like him!But, after a while, Arashi notices something strange happening.His body's heating up, and there's only one way to scratch this itch...!!+
